Class Hotel

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hotel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    QueueHotel, StackHotel
    public abstract class Hotel
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that stores information about guests in a hotel. The concrete classes StackHotel and QueueHotel implement the abstract methods of this class using different data structures (stack and queue).
    Version:
    02-29-2020
    Author:
    Feras Salous

    • Method Detail

      • addGuest

        public abstract boolean addGuest​(Guest guest)
        Add a Guest to the Hotel if there is room. checkOut() is completed.
        Parameters:
        guest - the new Guest
        Returns:
        true if the guest is added; false otherwise.

      • numGuestsCheckedIn

        public abstract int numGuestsCheckedIn()
        Return the number of guests currently checked into the hotel.
        Returns:
        the number of guests added to the hotel that have not been checked out

      • nextGuestToCheckOut

        public abstract Guest nextGuestToCheckOut()
        Return the Guest that will check out next. (Leave the Hotel unchanged.) If no Guests are checked in, return null. StackHotel and QueueHotel use FIFO and FILO rules respectively to decide which Guest will check out next.
        Returns:
        the next Guest to check out

      • checkOut

        public abstract Guest checkOut()
        Remove and return the next Guest from the Hotel. If the Hotel is empty, return null. StackHotel and QueueHotel have different implementations of this method. A StackHotel checks out the most recent Guest added to the Hotel. A QueueHotel checks out the Guest that has been checked in the longest.
        Returns:
        the Guest removed from the Hotel

      • checkOut

        public java.lang.String checkOut​(java.time.LocalDateTime timeCheckedOut)
        Remove the next Guest from the Hotel and return a String with information about the duration of the Guest's stay.
        Parameters:
        timeCheckedOut - the date and time when the Guest checked out
        Returns:
        A String with the following format: "Hotel Name: Guest Checking out: Length of Stay: Checked In: Checked Out: " If the Hotel is empty, the String has this format: "No rooms are currently taken at the "
